name: fusionPlusAPI
description: Access 1inch Fusion+ API for cross-chain swaps. This API provides advanced gasless swaps with MEV protection. EXAMPLES: For active orders: {"endpoint": "getActiveOrders", "srcChain": 1, "dstChain": 137}. For escrow factory: {"endpoint": "getEscrowFactory", "chainId": 1}. For quote: {"endpoint": "getQuote", "srcChain": 1, "dstChain": 137, "srcTokenAddress": "0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2", "dstTokenAddress": "0x2791Bca1f2de4661ED88A30C99A7a9449Aa84174", "amount": 1000000000000000000, "walletAddress": "0x742d35Cc6634C0532925a3b8D4C9db96C4b4d8b6", "enableEstimate": false}.

endpoint.description: REQUIRED: The Fusion+ API endpoint to call. Use 'getActiveOrders' to get cross-chain swap active orders, 'getEscrowFactory' to get escrow factory contract address, 'getQuote' to get quote details for cross-chain swaps.

limit.description: Number of active orders to receive (default: 100, max: 500)

srcChain.description: Source chain ID (required for getActiveOrders and getQuote). Use 1 for Ethereum, 137 for Polygon, etc.

dstChain.description: Destination chain ID (required for getActiveOrders and getQuote). Use 1 for Ethereum, 137 for Polygon, etc.

chainId.description: Chain ID (required for getEscrowFactory). Use 1 for Ethereum, 137 for Polygon, etc.

srcTokenAddress.description: Address of source token (required for getQuote). Example: 0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2 for WETH

dstTokenAddress.description: Address of destination token (required for getQuote). Example: 0x2791Bca1f2de4661ED88A30C99A7a9449Aa84174 for USDC

amount.description: Amount to swap (required for getQuote). Amount in wei format

walletAddress.description: Wallet address (required for getQuote). Address of the wallet or contract who will create Fusion order

enableEstimate.description: Enable estimation (required for getQuote). If enabled then get estimation from 1inch swap builder and generates quoteId

fee.description: Fee in bps format, 1% is equal to 100bps (optional for getQuote)

isPermit2.description: Permit2 allowance transfer encoded call (optional for getQuote)

permit.description: Permit, user approval sign (optional for getQuote)
